item.title: Live review: Lord Of The Lost, 23-09-23, London, UK
item.description: After a long train journey in which I drained my phone battery to about 36%, I arrived about an hour early at the O2 Shepherd’s Bush Empire venue and was surprised to find a sloppy long winding queue in an alley down the side of the building. With some difficulty, I was able to find where I could join in. The weather was crisp but not cold and there was a nice atmosphere.
